description: Number of quasi-alternating permutations of length n.
comments: The number of permutations of [n] with n-2 sequences (see Comtet).

formula: E.g.f.: 3+2*x + u(x)^2-4*u(x) where u(x)=(tan(x)+sec(x)). - Barbara Haas Margolius (margolius(AT)math.csuohio.edu), Mar 12 2001E.g.f.: 2 * (1 + x + (1 - 2*cos(x)) / (1 - sin(x)). - _Michael Somos_, Aug 28 2012Asymptotics: a(n) ~ 8(2/Pi)^(n+1)((n+1)/Pi-1))n!a(n) = A001250(n+1) - 2*A001250(n). - Barbara Haas Margolius (margolius(AT)math.csuohio.edu), Mar 12 2001
